about_the_game:
Ancient Woodlands is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Drumming Meditation
  • March into the Mist
  • Tales from the Past

Ambience
  • Agitated Magic Forest

SFX
  • Animate Trees (4)
  • Call Nature (4)
  • Treant Collapse (4)
  • Dig Roots (4)
  • Treant Hurt (4)
  • Treant Roar (4)
  • Treant Slam Hit (4)
  • Treant Slam Miss (4)
  • Treant Step (4)
detailed_description:
Ancient Woodlands is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
